channel.title: Career on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in Career on davidstamen.com

item.title: To Infinity and Beyond
item.description:
Life can always surprise you. For the past few years I have been chasing the dream like most to work for the “mothership” and recently the calling came.

This month I will be joining the CPBU at VMware as a Technical Marketing Engineer focusing on vSphere Upgrades. I will be working alongside Adam Eckerle, Emad Younis, Kyle Ruddy and Nigel Hickey.
